title: Score 15% off this outdoor furniture set!
content:
From family barbeques to drinks with friends, an outdoor furniture bundle from BRIQ can help you enjoy al fresco dining in style this summer. Included is a modular sofa that’s both comfortable and stylish, plus a stunning firepit table that will keep you warm once the sun goes down. Sound perfect? If you take advantage of this exclusive deal, you can save up to 15% on the set! All you need to do is enter the code IDEALSLUXOR at the checkout and you’ll pay a total of £1,614 instead of the usual £1,899. You’ll also receive free, two-man delivery within two to four weeks!

Get 15% off

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

BRIQ creates quality furniture for your home and your garden. The brand has become a favourite amongst UK celebrities, so unsurprisingly it’s been featured in countless national publications, including HomeStyle magazine.

This set includes a Six-Piece Luxor Rattan Modular Sofa and a Firepit Table. The specifications are as follows:

Sofa

  • Wicker effect and polyester fabric
  • Modules can be arranged in any shape
  • Synthetic black and grey rattan fabric
  • Black cushions
  • Aluminium frame
  • Foam cushion (10cm thick)
  • UV and water resistant
  • Arrives fully assembled

Firepit table

  • CSA table
  • 8mm tempered glass

Ready to take advantage of this great deal?

Offer ends 31/08/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get 15% off

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
